entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 p.m. ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
